title: Authors and Citation
text: barja (2024). geoidep: Download geographic data various topics provided managed Spatial Data Infrastructure Peru (IDE-Peru). R package version 0.1.0, https://geografo.pe/geoinei.
code: @Manual{,   title = {geoidep: Download geographic data on various topics provided and managed by the Spatial Data Infrastructure of Peru (IDE-Peru)},   author = {antony barja},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://geografo.pe/geoinei}, }

what: Download Peruvian data managed by the Spatial Data Infrastructure (SDI) of the National Institute of Statistics and Informatics (INEI) of Peru
title: Download Peruvian data managed by the Spatial Data Infrastructure (SDI) of the National Institute of Statistics and Informatics (INEI) of Peru
text: goal geoidep offers R users easy accessible way obtain official cartographic data various topics, society, transport, environment, agriculture, catastre, climate, among others. also includes information provided regional government entities technical-scientific institutions, managed Spatial Data Infrastructure Peru (IDEP).

title: Download Peruvian data managed by the Spatial Data Infrastructure (SDI) of the National Institute of Statistics and Informatics (INEI) of Peru

title: Download Peruvian data managed by the Spatial Data Infrastructure (SDI) of the National Institute of Statistics and Informatics (INEI) of Peru
text: basic example shows solve common problem: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . can also embed plots, example: case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.

what: Download the Departament limits of INEI — get_departaments
title: Download the Departament limits of INEI — get_departaments
text: function allows download latest version geometry ubigeos corresponding official political division departament boundaries Peru. information, can visit following page https://ide.inei.gob.pe/#capas

title: Download the Departament limits of INEI — get_departaments
code: get_departaments(dsn = NULL, show_progress = TRUE, quiet = TRUE)

title: Download the Departament limits of INEI — get_departaments
text: dsn Character. Output filename. missing, temporary file created. show_progress Logical. Suppress bar progress. quiet Logical. Suppress info message.

title: Download the Departament limits of INEI — get_departaments
text: sf tibble object.

title: Download the Departament limits of INEI — get_departaments
code: library(geoidep) dist <- get_departaments(show_progress = FALSE) #> Error in curl::curl_fetch_disk(url, x$path, handle = handle): SSL peer certificate or SSH remote key was not OK: [ide.inei.gob.pe] SSL certificate problem: unable to get local issuer certificate head(dist) #>                                                                      #> 1 function (x, method = "euclidean", diag = FALSE, upper = FALSE,    #> 2     p = 2)                                                         #> 3 {                                                                  #> 4     if (!is.na(pmatch(method, "euclidian")))                       #> 5         method <- "euclidean"                                      #> 6     METHODS <- c("euclidean", "maximum", "manhattan", "canberra",
